PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-08502018-06-21,  TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Designated Provisions – Projection of Directed Bright Light Source at an Aircraft)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (DESIGNATED PROVISIONS – PROJECTION OF DIRECTED BRIGHT LIGHT SOURCE AT AN AIRCRAFT) in order to reduce the number of laser attacks on aircraft and to enhance the safety of crew members, passengers and air travel by creating an effective, more timely deterrent to laser attacks and to enable immediate enforcement measures for offences.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0134 Publication Date: 2018-07-11
AttachmentsAttachment
